short_summary: Demolish, remove, construct and repair structures for the internal grounding management system at site located at Montreal-Jean Charest, QC.
description: Construction of a new contemporary valve chamber, installation of two refurbished historic valves, instillation of a new Stainless Steel Y-Pipe system, new concrete works and supply of a passive groundwater management system at site located in City of Sault Ste Marie, ON and Sault Ste. Marie Canal National Historic Site Of Canada. The Project aims to explore how apply Nature Based solutions (such as Damp mitigation), Sovereign Aff handle hydro Risk.
